ygData.subject: Re: AE heals
ygData.msgSnippet: ok sis--:) i have heard of the same spell, but not actually seen it for sale myself...im pretty sure it does exist, but i havent done much investigating....not
ygData.messageBody:
ok sis--:)
i have heard of the same spell, but not actually seen it for sale
myself...im pretty sure it does exist, but i havent done much
investigating....not sure if the vendors in the felwithe cleric guild will
sell to you, but im pretty sure its there....if you are in the area, check
it out...i believe they have been loading the first vendor on the right
with the newer cleric spells (revive, rezz, and res are there as well as
word of health )....hope that helps some, and if you find it let me
know..im on the Rathe too

Dank Skunksage
--a true, "HIGH" elf cleric (L36)

guild

heal
